mapper.select: select id,brand,series,price,licensing_time as licensingTime,level,gearbox, output_volume as outputVolume, mileage,location,pic,summary,create_time as createTime from t_springmvc_car where brand = #{brand} and series = #{series]
select id,brand,series,price,licensing_time as licensingTime,level,gearbox, output_volume as outputVolume, mileage,location,pic,summary,create_time as createTime from t_springmvc_car
